idea-plugin.name: Competitive Program Parser
idea-plugin.description: Competitive Programming parser - Mind Sport You should have Mind Sport IntelliJ Plugin installed for this to work. Pre-requisites: 1. Install [Mind Sport - IntelliJ Plugin](http://plugins.jetbrains.com/plugin/10652-competitive-program-parser) 2. Install [Mind Sport - Chrome Plugin](https://chrome.google.com/webstore/detail/mind-sport/epnaneaijfpjdfpbbnllhcflnammlcnh) 3. Clone and open [Java Template](https://github.com/tgvdinesh/mind-sport) Steps: 1. Open Java Template local project in IntelliJ. 2. Open Competitive programming challenge. Eg: Hacker Rank, Code Chef, etc. The list of supported websites are given here. 3. Click on Mind sport chrome extension shown on top of chrome browser. 4. That's all. You'll now see that the plugin will have replaced your io.json file and you are ready to solve the problem. PS: You should have opened java-template project in IntelliJ or it should at least be open previously for this plugin to work.
